body_html:
I believe the problem is that the global_step cannot be converted to a constant.
Moreover, after freezing the graph some weird ops regarding global step appear on my graph, mainly on batch norm ops. And by then, the quantization could not be done. On issue #3628 I present a workaround that worked for me.
body_text:
I believe the problem is that the global_step cannot be converted to a constant.
Moreover, after freezing the graph some weird ops regarding global step appear on my graph, mainly on batch norm ops. And by then, the quantization could not be done. On issue #3628  I present a workaround that worked for me.
body:
I believe the problem is that the global_step cannot be converted to a constant.
Moreover, after freezing the graph some weird ops regarding global step appear on my graph, mainly on batch norm ops. And by then, the quantization could not be done. On issue #3628  I present a workaround that worked for me.
